Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the player in the game.

    • setHand

      public void setHand(ArrayList<Tile> array)
      Place some cards in a temporary location, it set them down on the bookshelf with place hand method.
      Parameters:
      array - contains the tiles that the player wants to put in the bookshelf.

    • placeHand

      public void placeHand(int c)
      This method place in the bookshelf the cards given to the player by setHand method and automatically recalculate their points.
      Parameters:
      c - column in which a player places the tiles in the bookshelf
